imdb.title: Saiunkoku monogatari
imdb.plot: A girl called Sho Ruurei is offered 500 gold coins to become the Kings consort. She carelessly accepts the offer and has to tutor the King. The King falls in love with her however his brother is in love with her too.

episodes.title: There's a Different Side to Every Good Story
episodes.plot: Kou Shurrei is busy working her many jobs when she is visited by an important guest and given an opportunity for a job to make more money than she could have imagined, and one that could change more than the weight of her purse.

episodes.title: The Frog in the Well Knows Not the Great Ocean
episodes.plot: Shuurei after meeting King Shi Ryuuki, who pretending to be someone else, she needs to figure out a way to admit his identity and accept his responsibilities.

episodes.title: The Hawk with Talent Hides Its Talons
episodes.plot: After a month in the palace, Shuurei and King Shi Ryuuki continue being tutored by Li Kouyuu, while big rumors spread about the nightly romance between Shuurei and the King.

episodes.title: Casting Pearls Before a Swine
episodes.plot: Shuurei finds out that Ryuuki had been 'playing dumb' the entire time, at the same time, Ryuuki also finds out that she was a paid temporary consort for him. Ryuuki comes up with a contest to win money and Shuurei's forgiveness.

episodes.title: A Genius Can't Be a Genius Without Effort
episodes.plot: Things start to go missing of Shuurei's, it turns out that they were poisoned, but she is being kept in the dark. General Ran Shuuei's younger brother, Ryuuren, shows up in the palace and causes a ruckus.

episodes.title: Lacking the Finishing Touch
episodes.plot: Shuurei realizing that it is time to leave the palace, is suddenly kidnapped. A rescue mission as well as the capture of the culprits behind the poisoning and the abduction causes a disturbance in the palace and truths to be revealed.

episodes.title: Those That Swim Well Drown Even the Strongest Swimmer Can Drown
episodes.plot: After being rescued, Shuurei is still poisoned. The King must make a promise for the future to secure the antidote.

episodes.title: Wanting to Borrow a Cat's Paws
episodes.plot: Ryuuki works on a proposal that will make Shuurei's dream come true, and will also affect all women and the country. Now back at home, Shuurei picks up a man who had collapsed outside her house because of the heat.

episodes.title: A Journey of a Thousand Miles Starts with a Single Step
episodes.plot: Back in the palace with a new mission, Shuurei not informed about Ryuuki's proposal, works hard in the Finance Dept. dressed as a male.

episodes.title: Fine Weather Comes to Those Who Wait
episodes.plot: Ryuuki plans an evening visiting to Shuurei at her house, however a bandit attack in the day causes him to have to change his plans.

episodes.title: There Is No Cure for Lovesickness
episodes.plot: A side story that took place after the aptitude test but before the results were received. Shuurei gets sick; there are flashbacks, visitors and enough trouble keep everyone on their toes.

episodes.title: Discretion Is the Better Part of Valour
episodes.plot: Shuurei passed the aptitude test and can take the exam. Others who have come to take the exam from other regions are coming into the city, however this draws those who wish to take advantage out of the shadows.

episodes.title: From a Gourd Comes a Horse
episodes.plot: Shuurei along with Ryuuki, Shuuei, Kouyuu, Seien and To Eigetsu are hold up in a Brothel, while the Seikin Gang attacks.

episodes.title: On a Rock for Three Years
episodes.plot: Shuurei and Eigetsu pass the exams, and start their journeys as officials. Though it an easy path for the first woman nor the youngest under the strict Instructor Ro.

episodes.title: Children Know Not Their Parents' Hearts
episodes.plot: Shuurei and Eigetsu continue their hard work. Kouyuu reflects and ponders his feelings toward his position and his family.

episodes.title: There Are No Demons in This World
episodes.plot: Shuurei and Eigetsu continue to be bullied while working to prove themselves to the court officials.

episodes.title: Poking a Bush Draws Out a Snake
episodes.plot: Kou Reishin is under arrest because of the rumor that he used dishonest methods during the exam. Shuurei and Eigetsu after being freed from capture, need to complete some documents to incriminate the culprit behind all of this.

episodes.title: Don't Cover Your Head and Leave Your Bottom Exposed
episodes.plot: The Court Officials are holding an inquiry not only for the rumor of Shuurei's capabilities and results on the exam, but also to report on the improper deeds of the Official that was behind everything.

episodes.title: If You Love Your Child, Let Them Go on a Journey
episodes.plot: Shuurei and Eigetsu as well as all of the other new officials are given their placements in the Royal Court, which some placements cause a ruckus in the court.
